summary: After growing up in a poor gypsy camp, Edmond Vidal, aka Momon, has retained a sense of family, unfailing loyalty and pride in his origins. Most of all, he has remained friends with Serge ... See full summary »
cast: Gérard Lanvin|Tchéky Karyo|Daniel Duval|Lionnel Astier|Dimitri Storoge|Patrick Catalifo|François Levantal|Francis Renaud|Valeria Cavalli|Estelle Skornik|Olivier Chantreau|Stéphane Caillard|Florent Bigot de Nesles|Nicolas Gerout|Simon Astier|Laurent Richard|Olivier Rabourdin|Laurent Fernandez|Manu Lanvin|Christophe Kourotchkine|David Kammenos|Simon Sportich|Jacques Lacaze|Nicolas Abraham|Laurent Olmedo|Pasquale D'Inca|Jean-Pierre Laurent|Jean-Pierre Léonardini|Pierre-André Gilard|Mounira Kachouche|Linda Massoz|Jo Fogetta|André Lopez|Jean-Louis Quiniou|Alexandre de Sèze|Tim Wantersten|Christian Neil Vidal|Virginie Arnaud|Louis Vidal|Cédric Weber|Jordan Prenat|Vincent Trouilleux|Valentin Robby Wanterstein|Samia Sebti|Joseph Vidal|Gilles Benichou|Rudy Owen Heredia|Laurent Vercelletto|Iago Cottier David|Sian Ramond|Johann Tarres|Stéphane Naigeon|Bernard Villanueva|Jacques Chambon|Misha Brice Cortes|Ari Najjarian|Morad Slimani|Malek Oudjail|Etienne Chicot|Simon Benattar-Bourgeay|Valerie Grillet|Pascal Guillemin|Maxence Kouzoubachian|Caroline Derrien|Thierry Genovese|Pierre Yves Lenik
title: Los lioneses
